name: Kenoma (Demo)
description:
This is a demo for Kenoma, a 2D-sidescrolling graphic adventure game.

Open to you is the introductory leg of a wanderer's pilgrimage to and through an ancient holy city, for a purpose known only to them.

Windows and Linux versions are offered.

Please note: the Windows version may require the user to bypass a Windows Defender pop-up about the executable having an unknown publisher.

Controls are set in-game.

Uses the Godot engine with the following Add-Ons:
Dialogic by Emilio Coppola and Jowan-Spooner
Godot Sound Manager by Nathan Hoad and Daelon Suzuka
